import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Message from '../Main/Message' import Cart from '../Main/Cart' const ProductList = ({ products }) => { return (

Shop

{products.map(({ id, name, image, price }, index) => (

{name}

{price}
Add to cart
))}
) } ProductList.propTypes = { } export default ProductList
